name: Follow Your Path
description:
Follow Your Path

I made this Game for the Mini Game Jam - Chance with the restriction No RNG. 

Use the arrow keys to establish a path to your Bone, but be careful, your shadow follow you.

Because your shadow follow the same path than you, this game is supposed to be a strategy Game, however the situation quickly becomes chaotic and you can only rely on Chance.

By Chance or Skills, will you survive to the end?
